welcome_note_intro.message: This is your first note. Quick Notes helps you take notes quickly and efficiently.

welcome_note_ai_content.message:
• Click the + button to create a new note
• Use AI to summarize, translate, or improve content
• AI can help you organize and optimize your notes
welcome_note_ai_content.description: AI usage instructions in welcome note

welcome_note_collections_title.description: Collections section title in welcome note

welcome_note_collections_content.message:
• Right-click on empty space to create a collection
• Drag and drop notes into collections to organize
• Each collection can have its own theme (work, personal, ideas...)
welcome_note_collections_content.description: Collections usage instructions in welcome note

welcome_note_tips_title.description: Tips section title in welcome note

welcome_note_tips_content.message:
• Use colors to categorize notes
• Pin important notes to the top of the list
• Search quickly with the search bar above
• Sync with Google Drive for safe backup

ai_workspace_intro.message: AI Workspace is a powerful feature designed to maximize the potential of AI models, allowing you to create analysis and process entire note collections at once instead of individual notes.

ai_workspace_find_patterns.description: Button to find patterns in collection

ai_workspace_generate_insights.description: Button to generate insights from collection

ai_workspace_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for AI Workspace input

ai_workspace_processing.description: Text shown while AI is processing in workspace

ai_workspace_no_notes.message: No notes in this collection to analyze

ai_workspace_usage_limit.message: Daily usage limit reached. Upgrade to premium for unlimited AI Workspace access.
ai_workspace_usage_limit.description: Message when daily limit is reached

ai_workspace_prompt.message:
What would you like AI to do with these notes?

Examples:
- Summarize all notes
- Extract main themes and keywords
- Create a master to-do list
- Generate FAQ from these notes
- Find connections between topics
ai_workspace_prompt.description: Prompt text for AI Workspace task input

ai_workspace_task_synthesis.message: Create a comprehensive summary from all notes in this collection. Highlight the most important points and create a single, cohesive summary.

ai_workspace_task_themes.message: Identify 5 main themes and related keywords from these research notes. Create a structured list with themes and corresponding keywords.

ai_workspace_task_todo.message: Scan all notes and create a comprehensive to-do list. Find all 'action items', tasks, or work to be done mentioned in the notes and create a structured checklist.

ai_workspace_task_faq.message: From these notes, create a list of frequently asked questions and answers (FAQ). Identify important topics and create appropriate questions with detailed answers.

ai_workspace_task_search.message: Find and explain connections between information in the notes. Identify links, contradictions, or relationships between different topics mentioned in the notes.
